rule.name: No Smoking
rule.description: Smoking is prohibited in all areas of the train.

rule.name: Reserved Seats
rule.description: All passengers must have a reserved seat.

rule.name: Baggage Limit
rule.description: Each passenger is allowed to carry a maximum of two pieces of baggage.

rule.name: No Alcohol
rule.description: Alcohol consumption is not allowed on the train.

rule.name: No Pets
rule.description: Only service animals are allowed on the train.
